platformGuideIntro: This guide explains what to watch, how auto-config starts, and when notifications are generated for each platform.
platformGuideLumaItem1: Enable Settings → Folders → Enable LumaPlay Watcher.
platformGuideLumaItem2: Windows only: the app listens for realtime registry events under HKCU\SOFTWARE\LumaPlay.
platformGuideLumaItem3: The watcher starts only when enabled; if disabled, no LumaPlay registry watcher process is started.
platformGuideLumaItem4: LumaPlay configs are expected as platform=uplay and emu=lumaplay.
platformGuideConfigRulesItem1: Steam/Uplay/GOG/Steam Official use regular app IDs; Epic may use numeric or hex-like IDs.
platformGuideConfigRulesItem2: Xenia title IDs are hex and can be provided with or without the 0x prefix.
platformGuideConfigRulesItem3: RPCS3 expects trophy-set IDs in NP* format (example: NPWR12345_00).
platformGuideConfigRulesItem5: LumaPlay config detection requires platform=uplay and emu=lumaplay.
platformGuideRescanItem1: Regenerate Schema is used for Steam/Uplay/Epic/GOG schema refresh.
platformGuideRescanItem2: For Xenia, RPCS3, shadPS4 and Steam Official, schema regenerate is blocked by design.
platformGuideRescanItem3: For those platforms/emulators, use Folders → Rescan to rebuild from source files.
platformGuideOnboardingItem1: On first run (or onboarding version change), startup waits for folder selection before full scanning.
platformGuideOnboardingItem2: While onboarding is pending, folder watchers are deferred to avoid unwanted auto-config activity.
platformGuideOnboardingItem3: Reminder messages are emitted periodically (about every 20s by default) until a decision is made.
platformGuideOnboardingItem4: Tray action Resume Startup applies skip-all and mutes all discovered folders for auto-config.
platformGuideStateFiltersItem1: Ignored folders are stored as blocked watched folders and are not scanned.
platformGuideStateFiltersItem2: Blacklisted AppIDs are skipped by auto-config and blocked for schema operations.
platformGuideStateFiltersItem3: Disable Global Progress and per-game progress mute affect progress notifications only.
platformGuideStateFiltersItem4: Disable Playtime and Disable Platinum control only their dedicated notification types.
platformGuideRecoveryItem1: Missing watched folders are rechecked periodically (around 4 seconds).
platformGuideRecoveryItem2: When a missing folder reappears, watcher attach and follow-up scan are retried automatically.
platformGuideRecoveryItem3: Temporary single-root auto-config folders in OS Temp are cleaned automatically after generation.
platformGuideQuickTip1: Add root folders in Settings → Folders.
platformGuideQuickTip2: Auto-config runs only for watched folders that are not muted/ignored.
platformGuideQuickTip3: Notifications are sent only on new unlock/progress changes, not for already imported old unlocks.
platformGuideRpcs3Item2: Runtime updates are detected from TROPUSR.DAT and TROPCONF.SFM.
platformGuideShadps4Item2: Trophy discovery and schema generation are based on PS4 trophy files (for example TROP.XML).
platformGuideSteamItem1: Core flow: watch save/achievement files (for example achievements.json, achievements.ini, stats.bin, user_stats.ini) inside configured roots.
platformGuideSteamItem2: Manual config: set a valid AppID and correct Save path.
platformGuideSteamItem3: Uplay note: if Steam mapping is needed, use the mapped Steam AppID field when available.
platformGuideSteamItem4: Epic emu method (Nemirtingas): if NemirtingasEpicEmu is used, the scanner discovers numeric AppIDs from user subfolders and treats them as Epic candidates.
platformGuideSteamItem5: GOG method 1 (preferred): detect goggame-*.info files and read game IDs from those files.
platformGuideSteamItem6: GOG method 2 (fallback): detect UniverseLAN.ini and read GameSettings.AppID; runtime progress is monitored from UniverseLANData\\Achievements.ini.
platformGuideSteamItem7: TENOKE method: detect tenoke.ini and read id=APPID.
platformGuideSteamItem8: TENOKE runtime: after config creation, watcher searches deeper for user_stats.ini (including SteamData\\user_stats.ini), updates save_path, and relinks automatically.
platformGuideSteamItem9: GOG can also run with manual config using a valid AppID and Platform = GOG, even without .info or UniverseLAN.ini.
platformGuideSteamItem10: If only numeric folders are present, auto mode may classify by heuristics; for strict GOG behavior, keep goggame-*.info/UniverseLAN.ini or set platform manually.
platformGuideSteamOfficialItem2: Detection is based on UserGameStatsSchema_*.bin files.
platformGuideSteamOfficialItem3: If schema/progress seems outdated, use folder rescan instead of manual schema regeneration.
platformGuideTroubleshootingItem1: Check that the game is not blacklisted and progress notifications are not muted globally/per-config.
platformGuideTroubleshootingItem2: Verify watched folder paths and confirm the save/trophy files actually change while playing.
platformGuideTroubleshootingItem3: After moving saves or emulator directories, run Rescan in Folders.
platformGuideTroubleshootingItem4: Match privilege level between app and game (non-admin/non-admin or admin/admin) for reliable overlay shortcuts.
platformGuideTroubleshootingItem5: If overlay hotkeys are blocked in a game, switch to a 3-key combination and avoid commonly intercepted keys.
platformGuideTroubleshootingItem6: In elevated/protected game contexts, drag may fail; use snap positions (Ctrl+Alt+Shift+1..5) or nudge mode (Ctrl+Alt+Shift+Arrow Keys).
platformGuideTroubleshootingItem7: If PageUp/PageDown does not work in overlay, use the fallback Ctrl+PageUp / Ctrl+PageDown.
platformGuideTroubleshootingItem8: If sound plays but notifications appear late, lower preset cost (blur/shadows/large transforms) and reduce notification duration.
platformGuideXeniaItem1: Watch the Xenia content/profile path where .gpd files are updated.
platformGuideXeniaItem2: Auto-config reads title data, generates schema/images, and starts notification flow from those files.
title.overlay-interact-shortcut-info: Toggle interaction: press once to enable drag/scroll, press again to return to click-through. Requires a non-modifier key (e.g. \).
aria.overlay-interact-shortcut-info: Toggle interaction: press once to enable drag/scroll, press again to return to click-through. Requires a non-modifier key (e.g. \).
title.sort-time-cycle: Sort by last updated (oldest-newest / newest-oldest / Off)
tooltip.platformLocked: Platform is locked for existing configs. Create a new config to change it.
main.message.schemaPs4Rescan: PS4 schemas are generated from trophy files. Rescan the folder instead.
main.message.schemaSteamOfficialRescan: Steam (Official) schemas are generated from appcache stats. Rescan the stats folder instead.
boot.loading.title: Booting…
boot.onboarding.title: Choose folders for Auto-Config
boot.onboarding.message: We found folders with achievement data. Select which folders should be scanned automatically.
boot.onboarding.searchFailed: Folder search failed. You can skip and continue.
boot.onboarding.noCandidates: No candidate folders found. Continue to app.
boot.onboarding.autoSkippedNoCandidates: No candidate folders were found. Auto-config was skipped.
boot.onboarding.attention: Startup is waiting for your folder selection ({seconds}s).
boot.onboarding.skippedDone: Auto-config was skipped. Discovered folders were muted.
boot.onboarding.startedWithCount: Auto-Config started in background for {count} folder(s). Games will appear after config creation.
boot.onboarding.startedMuted: No folders selected. All discovered folders were muted for auto-config.
boot.onboarding.empty: No folders with known achievement files were discovered.
alert.onboardingPending: Boot onboarding is still in progress.
notify.bootOnboardingResumeSuccess: Startup resumed. Auto-config was skipped and discovered folders were muted.
